description: The fair's visitor numbers have already returned to pre-pandemic levels.
title: How Art Basel Hong Kong Director Angelle Siyang-Le Is Positioning the Fair to Represent the Region

description: According to the curator, the next edition will be very global, highlighting a polyphony of perspectives while still focusing on Indigenous artists as carriers of alternative forms of knowledge.
title: Curator Kitty Scott On Her Vision for the 15th Shanghai Biennale

description: The exhibition showcases work by Vincent van Gogh, Jan Toorop, William Degouve de Nuncques, Odilon Redon, Pierre Puvis de Chavannes and Piet Mondrian, among others.
title: Unveiling Helene Kröller-Müller’s Legacy in ‘Searching for Meaning’

description: From a waterfront resort in Lake Tahoe to a boutique lodge in Woodinville wine country, several luxury hotels encourage guests to plan a pressure-free itinerary complete with ample time for reflection and relaxation.
title: The Best Hotels for Cozy Winter Escape Out West

description: This absurdist comedy—the final production to run at Soho Rep—has a hallucinogenic plot that brings to mind the days when artistic risk was the norm and downtown performance art was in high ferment.
title: Review: ‘Give Me Carmelita Tropicana!’ Is A Crazy Avant-Garde Flashback

description: Will these buzzy outposts from London, Miami and Los Angeles, as well as brand-new boîtes, entice New Yorkers to join?
title: 5 New Members Clubs Landing in New York City

description: Sam Altman's crypto venture Worldcoin is rebranding to just 'World.'
title: Sam Altman Has a Side Project Called ‘World’ Aimed at Tackling a World Ruled by A.I.
